actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a reduced rate of tax for gasoline which contains grain alcohol and no lead.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, for a reduced excise rate on gasoline which contains ten percent grain alcohol and no lead. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 4081)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a reduced rate of tax for gasoline which contains grain alcohol and no lead.
